name: MindBoom
description:
MindBoom was made during the 48 hour GameDevsPt game jam 2022 as a part of the Global Game Jam 2022.

It was our first Game jam and for many of us our first game! 48 hours isn't alot of time to learn and develop a game at the same time :'D

All assets but some parts of the code we're made 100% by our team :)

Dwelve into the mind of a broken child, split in 2 by trauma, in this game you have to escape your mind by defeating enemies and reaching the end.

Controls:

WASD - movement

F - Warp between planes of existence

E - You'll know at the end

Missing planned features: 
  • Killing enemies
  • More Room variety
  • Boss Battle
  • Weapon Pickups
  • Post-processing effects

Guilherme Meneses - Game Producer & Lead Progammer

Cláudio Silva - Gameplay Programmer

Diogo Pinto - Co Lead Gameplay Programmer

Afonso Godinho - Graphic Designer & Lead Game Designer

Sílvia Lemos - Sprite and Environment Artist
